question: A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday.Write a letter to your friend. In your lettertell your friend how they can contact you when you are awaygive instructions about how to care for your petdescribe other things they will need to do to take care of your houseWrite at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear …………………,
text: I would like to thank you for taking care of my pet while I am travelling as I had to  fly out immediately because it was an emergency at my work.I will summarize everything you might need to know in this letter.

First, my email is working while I am away and also my mobile  so you can contact me any time between 8:00 am and 10:00 pm.After that, I think I will be sleeping, however I wake up several times during the night to drink water or go to the washroom so you can send me a message and I will  call you back.
Second, my pet's food is all on the red shelf inside the kitchen.Furthermore, you can find its plastic plates and blankets in the second drawer under the sink.

Third, inside my home there are several plants and flowers and I would appreciate it if you can water them every other Monday.Moreover, I left some pies and sweets inside my fridge so you can enjoy them when you are in my home.
Finally, thanks for all your efforts and I will be calling you daily to check if you need anything.Let me know if you would like to have any special souvenir from Lebanon.
